title: CBS promo typeface?
content:
I’ve looking for this font for a while. Does anybody have a clue, what it might be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221042im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_4248.jpg)

Thanks.

 [‹ Looking for a serif to compliment Benton Sans and Berthold City](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41836 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mixed Bag of ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41813 "Go to next forum topic")
author: syncro

comments.content:
Perhaps a predigital precursor to [Plaza](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221042/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/scangraphic/plaza_sh/?sample_text=the%20cbs%20saturday%20night%20movies).

Do I get bonus pts for alliteration?

This looks like a slightly modified ITC Plaza.

- Lex
Indeed, Plaza is quite near. Thanks for hints and tips.
